subcategories.name: Nudity (explicit)
subcategories.description: Exposure of genitals or areolas, explicit anatomical detail.

subcategories.name: Nudity (partial/implied)
subcategories.description: Partial or implied exposure (sheer textures, strategic coverage).

subcategories.name: Sexualized pose/gestures
subcategories.description: Suggestive body posing, suggestive hand or tongue gestures.

subcategories.name: Sexual objects/symbolism
subcategories.description: Objects/toys or overtly sexual symbolism included as props or textures.

subcategories.name: Fetish/kink attire or paraphernalia
subcategories.description: Bondage gear, explicit fetish costumes, paraphernalia.

subcategories.name: Suggestive minors / childlike models (ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Childlike proportions or cues in adult contexts; ambiguous—flag for review.

subcategories.name: Sexual exploitation indicators (clear)
subcategories.description: Clear sexual exploitation cues including commercialization of sexual content.

subcategories.name: Weapons (lethal)
subcategories.description: Firearms, swords, explosives clearly depicted.

subcategories.name: Weapons (non-lethal)
subcategories.description: Batons, tasers, improvised weapons.

subcategories.name: Blood/gore (graphic)
subcategories.description: Graphic depiction of blood, severed parts, or gore textures.

subcategories.name: Injury/harm (non-graphic)
subcategories.description: Bruises, minor blood, implied injury.

subcategories.name: Threatening pose/intent
subcategories.description: Aggressive stance with implied intent to harm.

subcategories.name: Extremist symbols/insignia (clear)
subcategories.description: Recognized extremist insignia, banners, or patches.

subcategories.name: Hate slogans/gestures (clear)
subcategories.description: Recognized hate slogans or gestures.

subcategories.name: Uniforms/attire linked to extremist orgs (clear)
subcategories.description: Attire closely associated with extremist groups.

subcategories.name: Desecration/profanation of sacred figures/objects (clear)
subcategories.description: Degrading context for sacred figures, icons, or objects.

subcategories.name: Holy texts/symbols misused with degrading context (clear)
subcategories.description: Holy texts/symbols used in insulting or degrading ways.

subcategories.name: Potential misappropriation of cultural attire/sacred regalia (ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Attire/regalia used without clear respectful context—ambiguous.

subcategories.name: Stereotypical caricatures (ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Caricatures or stylizations that may demean a culture—ambiguous.

subcategories.name: Insults/derision (mild/ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Insulting text or cues without explicit slurs—ambiguous.

subcategories.name: Mocking stereotypes (ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Mocking depictions without explicit hateful language—ambiguous.

subcategories.name: Degrading, dehumanizing content (clear)
subcategories.description: Directly dehumanizing labels or depictions.

subcategories.name: Threats/targeted harassment (clear)
subcategories.description: Explicit threats or targeted calls to harm.

subcategories.name: Profanity/cursing
subcategories.description: Profane language on textures/signage.

subcategories.name: Sexual language
subcategories.description: Sexual phrases or innuendo in text.

subcategories.name: Contact solicitation
subcategories.description: “DM/PM/chat me” or similar solicitations.

subcategories.name: Personal data request (contact channels)
subcategories.description: Requests to share contact info or channels.

subcategories.name: Personal identifiers
subcategories.description: Phone numbers, emails, addresses, IDs.

subcategories.name: Credential hints (codes/QR/barcodes)
subcategories.description: Barcodes, QR codes, IDs visible.

subcategories.name: Drugs/illicit substances or paraphernalia
subcategories.description: Narcotics, pipes, syringes; illegal-use cues.

subcategories.name: Theft/burglary tools/acts
subcategories.description: Lockpicks, crowbars in theft context.

subcategories.name: Explosives/illegal weapons
subcategories.description: Explosive devices or illegal armaments.

subcategories.name: Fraud/scams (textual solicitation)
subcategories.description: Scam-like messages or solicitations in text.

subcategories.name: Alcohol
subcategories.description: Bottles/cans/labels clearly indicating alcohol.

subcategories.name: Tobacco/vapes
subcategories.description: Cigarettes, cigars, vapes and related items.

subcategories.name: Gambling/lottery cues
subcategories.description: Dice, slots, betting signage or prompts.

subcategories.name: Paid adult services solicitation
subcategories.description: Text or cues offering adult services for money.

subcategories.name: Self-harm/suicide references (non-graphic)
subcategories.description: Non-graphic references to self-harm/suicide.

subcategories.name: Disturbing horror imagery (for minors)
subcategories.description: Frightening imagery inappropriate for children.

subcategories.name: Occult/demonic symbolism (contextual concern)
subcategories.description: Occult symbols that may be sensitive in kid spaces.

subcategories.name: Trademarked logos (clear)
subcategories.description: Recognizable brand logos/symbols.

subcategories.name: Character/IP likeness (clear)
subcategories.description: Recognizable protected characters/franchises.

subcategories.name: Counterfeit/brand confusion indicators (ambiguous)
subcategories.description: Stylized lookalikes suggesting protected IP—ambiguous.
